thread.title: Jay Z attends court as Big Pimpin' copyright trial gets underway
thread.title_full: Jay Z attends court as Big Pimpin' copyright trial gets underway - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Jay Z attends court as Big Pimpin' copyright trial gets underway
text: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - Attorneys for Jay Z said in court on Tuesday that the rapper had properly acquired the rights to an Egyptian musician's melody to use for his hit 1999 song "Big Pimpin'," as a trial in a longstanding copyright lawsuit got underway. Â»
